title: If someone next to me passes wind, should I renew my wudu? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: question is from rashid from tunisia if someone near me passes wind should i renew my wudu no of course not this is not related to proxy uh passing of wind if someone passes when then it is okay for him it is a must for him to go and perform mudu why would i perform mudu for his breaking of this is not logical nor islamic
